description: Set a HUD element to transition in color (or alpha) over time. Normally setting the color (or alpha) of an element causes an immediate visual change. However, if the color (or alpha) gets set within <time> after calling fadeOverTime, then the HUD element will transition to the new color over the ramining <time>.

params.name: time
description: The time to fade the element in seconds.

example: level.introString1.alpha = 0.3; // This will transition the alpha from whatever it was before to the new value of 0.3 over 1.2 seconds.
